description: This file is the main program entry point for a RESTful API backend implemented using ASP.NET Core. It configures services, sets up middleware, defines API endpoints for CRUD operations on notes, and integrates Swagger documentation.

methods.name: MapPost
methods.description: Creates a new note with title and content, validating input and returning created note details.

methods.name: MapGet (list)
methods.description: Retrieves all notes from the repository.

methods.name: MapGet (by id)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its unique id.

methods.name: MapPut
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id, validating input and returning the updated note.

methods.name: MapDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its id.
